name: Always Mort
description:
This game was created during the UPsi Jam 2.0, by Alexandre, Allan, Luca & Nima.

The theme was "Always More".

Always Mort is a 4 level long platform/puzzle game where you, the player, needs to complete each level by passing through the Gates.

[Press R if you encounter any bug]

Art credits :

  • Original music by Lord_Tigrou#0149 <3
  • Character sprites by blackdragon1727 [https://blackdragon1727.itch.io/16x16-pixel-adventures-character]
  • Traps sprites by blackdragon1727 [https://blackdragon1727.itch.io/free-trap-platformer]
  • Cave sprites by Adam Saltsman [https://adamatomic.itch.io/cavernas]
  • Sound effects by Dustyroom [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-54116]
